website_summaries.verdict: Good for those who don’t like dense, heavy eye drops.
pros: Do a good job soothing dry eyes
Don’t blur vision when you first put them in
No long-lasting irritation from preservative because it dissolves quickly
Relatively thin consistency makes them more comfortable to drop in the eye
cons: Some report brief stinging that quickly goes away

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe dry eye and am allergic to preservatives used in eye lubricants. I hate the costly little vials that are supposed to be used once with the left over solution thrown away. I tried other bottled brands with no preservative and liked them. When it was time to reorder I saw this brand in an economy size and decided to try it. The first drop in my right eye was heavenly! I didn't know my agitated eyes could feel so good! Absolutely fantastic! The itching and burning is gone...EUREKA! Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great eye drops!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! The first eyedrop I've found that doesn't leave my eyes worse than they started! I've tried so many other brands of eyedrops, and they only irritated and dried out my eyes in a horrible, unending cycle of applications - I swear, they formulate them just so you'll have to keep buying more! These are the best - I only put them in when my eyes feel terribly dry, and then they feel better for a long time after. No more putting drops in my eyes at night and waking up to drier eyes than I went to bed with! The bottle is also at least twice as large as your standard eye drops bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Makes my eyes happy
customer_reviews.text: I am a contact lens wearer, and I suffer from dry eyes. (Not a good combination I know.) My doctor recommended Systane, which I have used. I saw Thera Tears here on Amazon, and because it is cheaper and had good reviews I decided to try it. I actually like it better than Systane. It doesn't burn my eyes at all, and is a thinner consistency. I am "challenged" when it comes to putting eye drops in, sometimes getting more under my eye than actually in it. So this consistency works for me, easier to drop in and makes my eyes happy.
customer_reviews.author: JRStar

customer_reviews.title: I've used it 2 days now and I like the feeling this lubricant provides over Visine's Dry Eye ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it 2 days now and I like the feeling this lubricant provides over Visine's Dry Eye Relief and Systane Ultra. Until I find a problem, this will be my new go-to eye lubricant. I work in desert environments a lot, so after work I'm always looking for an eye rinse/lubricant. Can't wait to take a few bottles of this to my next job and see how it works in that environment.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Doctor...
customer_reviews.text: This is the brand that Kaiser Permanente recommends for dry eyes! I have it from having Laser eye surgery that did not work so I will have dry eyes the rest of my life; we use it for general dry eyes in the summer when the air conditioning sucks all the moisture from our house.l hghly recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight A

customer_reviews.title: Thera Tears always works- and LASTS!
customer_reviews.text: Years of dry eyes and many bottles of drops later I am staying with Thera Tears. It is the best. I've had plugs inserted by an ophthalmalogist, the drainage ducts sealed (very painful and they eventually open up again). So it is drops for me. Thera Tears always works and LASTS. I keep buying Thera Tears and I am always very happy that I can get them on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Nashville Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great drops post LASIK!
customer_reviews.text: I've really liked these drops -- I got LASIK a month or so ago, and after I finished using the individual drops they provided for me post-procedure, I use these nearly every morning. They are a nice consistency and my eyes feel refreshed after putting them in. These are not to "get the red out" as I can't use that in my eyes after LASIK, but these drops feel great! I love the big size of the bottle as I don't lose it and I prefer to have fewer little bottles (in my mind, they're a bit more plastic to trash and perhaps not as easy to recycle...?) I will buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: They are much better and gentler on the eye than cheaper eye drops
customer_reviews.text: I use these eyedrops every day and they are indispensable. They are much better and gentler on the eye than cheaper eye drops. I have allergies and some general dry eye, and I have never had a problem with these drops being irritating. Some others make my eyes sting, but not these. If you are wondering whether it's worth an extra few dollars for this brand, the quality is definitely there. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Did they alter the formula?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Theratears over the past year in the 1 fl oz. bottle, but my last 2 bottles have made my eyes burn and itch uncomfortably right after using them. I know it wasn’t a bad batch because I bought them from different locations at different times. Strangely, the single use vials do not have this effect— despite being the same product in a different package. I’ve switched over to the vials completely, but they are not as economical since they run out faster.
customer_reviews.author: A Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Soothes Eyes Even for Intense Readers!
customer_reviews.text: Many years ago a doctor advised me to use thera tears to combat the dry eye problem I was having. I was a law student at the time, and literally reading hundreds of pages per day. Over the course of years, I have tried different products, but I always come back to thera tears because they provide immediate and lasting relief, they never blur my vision or feel like a gel, and I have never had so much as a hint of any adverse reaction from them. When I grab for that bottle, I know relief is in my hand!
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Counsel

customer_reviews.title: Post LASIK dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these drops. The packaging was eye catching, the reviews were good, and the price was great compared to other brands. But these are just not great for me. Other eye drops are so satisfying to put in, but these feel like you had your eyes open underwater. It feels like water is the only lubricant in these, which caused me to need to use these about every hour compared to 2-3 hours for other brands. Will unfortunately need to shell out a few more dollars to get a better brand. Kind of bummed.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Better than Systane Ultra
customer_reviews.text: Love these eye drops! I have very dry eyes, so I use these about 2-3 times per day when I remember (per the recommendation of my eye doctor). Before I was using Systane Ultra, which I also liked, but found them a bit too thick and "gel like", and they left all of my eyelashes wet and stuck together. I like the consistency of Thera Tears better, I love that it comes in a 2-pack of 1 ounce bottles! The value on Amazon is great, two bottles cost the same as the price of one bottle at CVS near where I live.
customer_reviews.author: DLuds

customer_reviews.title: Dried out my eyes and gave a slight burning sensation when applied
customer_reviews.text: So I normally use Systane which is expensive and thought I might try this an a cheaper option. Boy was I wrong. There was a slight stinging sensation when I put the drop in my eyes and then over the next 60 minutes my eyes felt more dry than usual. It almost felt like this drop was cleaning out my eye balls and not lubricating them. I just bought another bottle of Systane and will stick with that until someone else makes a better alternate. TheraTears was a no-go for me.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeLover

customer_reviews.title: Causes eye pain and redness
customer_reviews.text: First bottle was fine . New bottle ( formula change?? ) caused pain in my eye and redness. Two days later, pain still there but a bit better ( now using preservative free drops )
customer_reviews.author: SarasotaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good and last longer than plain moisturizing drops
customer_reviews.text: I have severe dry eye and use prescription drops but during the day my eyes sometimes still get extremely dry. I used moisturizing otc drops but would need to use them several times. These drops are good. Normally I need them once in the middle of the day. When I first put them in, it kind of feels gritty. Within 30 seconds though the grit feeling is gone and my eyes feel much better and my eyes stay moist longer. I also like that the bottle is larger than most other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Reduction in ripped contacts
customer_reviews.text: My contacts, which were supposed to last three weeks, used to rip literally every three days. I've been putting these drops in before I put my contacts in and after I take them out, and there has been a world of difference! My eyes aren't nearly as dry as they used to be and they don't rip nearly as often.
customer_reviews.author: Marlia

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now.  The pain is gone!
customer_reviews.text: Thera Tears are the best drops for severe dry eyes! After trying the rest, these are the best!
customer_reviews.author: yarnlover

customer_reviews.title: Had to Visit Opthamalogist Three Times After Using These!  They Burn!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these eye drops from local stores and used them for years with good results. I have sensitive eyes, and my ophthalmologist recommended them. After using these eye drops purchased from this seller, I had to visit my ophthalmologist three times trying to determine the cause of my pain and discomfort. I've determined the eye drops purchased here are the problem. I'm stuck with more five bottles (I liked them so much, I bought four at once.) I tried them again last week, and my eyes immediately burned. Something is wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Melnda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best dry eye relief ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only dry eye drops that work for me. I've tried all of them. Most of them work temporarily then seem to make it worse. i have episodes where my dry eye condition is almost unbearable. I can't read watch tv or use them at all, they would wake me up at night. Using Thera tears diligently and also their omega oil supplements have made a huge difference. I've even stocked up so I'll never run out! They never burn when you put them in either, it's just instant relief! I love these drops.
customer_reviews.author: Buy the Bay

customer_reviews.title: Preservative Free??
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these drops for quite a few years now and awhile ago they eliminated the word preservative from the label and claim that when it is used -somehow it becomes preservative free in the eye when dropped in. I am questioning this as all people are not alike and we have varying degrees of dryness and I am finding that my eyes have been feeling more and more gritty than they have ever felt and as these are my primary drops- I have to question whether the drops are actually “turning preservative free in my eye”. I am going to experiment with other brands that truly are preservative free and see if there is a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: M. Poole

customer_reviews.title: BEST OVER THE COUNTER I COULD EVER USE!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many eye drops with limited success. I can and do endorse this product as being incredibly helpful with my chronic dry eyes. I am going to let my eye doctor know about it and encourage him to recommend it to his patients!
customer_reviews.author: Sewingjunkie

customer_reviews.title: ... affect your tear ducts for patients with dry eyes like myself. my eyes just can't seem to lubricate ...
customer_reviews.text: i didn't know anything about how preservatives can affect your tear ducts for patients with dry eyes like myself. my eyes just can't seem to lubricate my contact lenses and i had blurry vision that i thought was incorrect prescription strength this whole time. crazy but this works. and for $11 its much cheaper and not fancy at all. it just works and stays lubricated a lot longer. still need to use a drop or two every hour when i'm looking at the screen at work.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Drake Ramoray

customer_reviews.title: Dried my eyes out!
customer_reviews.text: This did not feel lubricating or soothing in the least. As soon as I applied it, my eye felt irritated and dried out - like when I go to sleep with my contacts in. I have already ordered something else. This was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: TM Conway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent relief from dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I live in a city with a higher amount of allergens and am always struggling with dry eyes. An optometrist friend recommended these noting that her school specifically mentioned the superior quality of these drops - and I can vouch for their effectiveness!
customer_reviews.author: Harbinger

customer_reviews.title: Great eye drops!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these eye drops. Have severe dry eyes from Lasik 18 years ago. Like that they become preservative free in the eye. Long lasting relief. Have been using for ever. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy, NC

customer_reviews.title: ~~Excellent product/Delivered to Door~~
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by Ophthalmologist for dry eyes. Have been using this product for several years and my eyes don't have that red, scratchy feeling in the morning. Very happy with this product and will continue to use. Most highly recommended and love the fact they are delivered to your door! Living 40 minutes from a store, I certainly don't want to run out for anything if I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity...

customer_reviews.title: Defective and dangerous Eyedrops
customer_reviews.text: There was no cellophane seal around the top of the bottle. Obviously I can't put something in my eyes that could have been tampered with. I have bought this product many times in local stores and there is ALWAYS a cellophane seal. And now Amazon is saying I can't return it??? I clearly cannot use it. A total WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: DebeGebee

customer_reviews.title: Discomforting Feeling -
customer_reviews.text: Drops sting eyes for approximate 3 seconds then continued blurred vision for up to 10 minutes with feeling of eyes being dilated. Very uncomfortable feeling all around - RefreshAdv'd so much better NON REFUNDABLE EVEN THOUGH IT DOES NOT STATE THAT ANYWHERE
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Chaviano

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of Thera Tears
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Eye Drop along with Thera Tears Fish Oil pills. Whether I'm using both or either one alone I have noticed my vision becomes blurry. I have chronic dry eye along with sun damage to my eyes so they are constantly red and irritated. I thought the blurry side effects were just me, but my brother had similar issues. When I first put the drops in it is very soothing and do not have problems. It is with continuous use I am seeing the issues with blurry vision. My brother and I have since stopped using both products and do not have these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Celedon

customer_reviews.title: Not for severe dry eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these for anyone with severe dry eyes. They are not very lubricating when I use them a night. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DJR902

customer_reviews.title: Used after Lasik Surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had lasik and was told to use preservative free eyedrops. But it was such a waste to throw away those little individual vials, and I never used all the drops in them and would let them sit on my desk/table overnight and I'm sure it wasn't great to keep using them...so I tried to find a regular bottle of drops. So I used the little vials for 2 weeks, and used the thera tears until my one month check-up. I just had my check-up and my eyes are great. I'm at a point that I can use whatever drops I want, but I'll keep using the thera drops.
customer_reviews.author: Samie May

customer_reviews.title: A great dry-eye tear.
customer_reviews.text: These so far are my favorite tears. We all know there are some preservatives and chemicals in dry eye concoctions that some people get a bit concerned about. I myself don't really like Propylene Glycol in my tears. PEG/PG tears don't scare me, I'm just unsure of why I need those chemicals in my eye. And these ones do not have it. They are relaxing, and seem to consist of normal ingredients. They fall under the carboxymethylcellulose sodium (CMC) group of tears. Other ingredients are easily accounted for. So far no problems. They are not gooey and seem to run from the nozzle appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: CrankTop Contributor: Rock Music

customer_reviews.title: UNCOMFORTABLE AND NOT USEFULL
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for dry eyes but it's too oily and is more uncomfortable then it's purpose to help with dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Works best for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried a bunch of different dry eye drops, and I had the best luck with these. Everyone is different so different products will work for different people. But these are what worked best for me. And these also say it's preservative free in the eyes which is a bonus. Apparently the preservatives turn into oxygen and water once in contact with the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Neur0n

customer_reviews.title: LASIK
customer_reviews.text: Update: Received LASIK and since these are preservative free, align with my post-op management. The value is unbeatable and I would recommend them to my significant other. Additional pictures for size. First: Believe me, I tried them all for severe dry eyes. This bottle is very large comparably. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Hero

customer_reviews.title: Not so helpful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this eye drop for a while since I don’t want to give the wrong information. I gave a very high expectation of it since many people said it was good. But after using it for a month, I dont feel it’s been helpful at all. My eyes still get dry in a short time, it only moisturizes for few seconds right after I use it which I think a lot of eye drops can do. I’ve been shopping a lot more from amazon due to the pandemic, but I think for things like this, it’ll still be better to go to the pharmacy and consult from a pharmacist.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eyes and worst, always work in front of computer screens. I used a few others teardrop before; can’t say this one works best, or otherwise, but I have used TheraTears eyes drops since a pharmacist at the drug store recommended to me. This is my 4th bottle so far.
customer_reviews.author: Yuthavy Lor

customer_reviews.title: Helps with dry eye symptoms
customer_reviews.text: Better to buy here with larger bottles than at Walgreens or CVS.
customer_reviews.author: GRK_Astronomer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had chronic dry eyes for around 10 years. I’ve used every brand there is. I prefer this brand. Good size bottle At a good price. I don’t have reaction to any preservatives like I do with cheaper brands. Been my favorite for past few years
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good Eye Drops
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised! Depicted as two (2) 1 oz bottles of Thera Tears eye drops in one merchandizing overpack. Only one bottle came with my order!!! I like the product, but as only one bottle was shipped, I feel gypped as the cost was twice as much as anticipated per bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve's Fixit Srvc.

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I have sjogrens syndrome so I'm always on the lookout for good eye drops. Sadly these only seemed to keep my eyes moist for about an hour. I've had success with other brands so this isn't an issue of needing a prescription. This just isn't strong enough for those with chronic dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Paprika

customer_reviews.title: Wife's Eye Doctor Recommended This Brand For Her Chronic Dry Eyes
customer_reviews.text: My Wife has had chronically dry eyes for many years now and has tried various brands of drops. Sometimes she would have to apply them 3-4 times. During her last eye exam, her Doctor gave her some additional suggestions along with a recommendation to try TheraTears. I asked her this morning how the drops were working for her and she said that instead of having to apply 3-4 times a day, she has only had to use the TheraTears twice a day. In that regards, we giving a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: PawPawRon

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I use this constantly all day. It is the only one that does not bring burning and pain, Also the price is exceptional. You can get the heavier one for more moisture and longevity but again, I don't like my eyes burning. I would start with this and then go to the heavier, then, overnight gel. I can't use the overnight gel.
customer_reviews.author: mdj

customer_reviews.title: soothing
customer_reviews.text: best eye drops, very soothing and lasts for hours. has a thick soft feel great for my dry eye problem
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a beyond your typical eye drops.  Will never go back!!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge step up from the typical eye drops. My wife had heard them advertise this product for some time and always wanted to try it. We both have dry eyes and normally use drops 3-times a day and still have bloodshot eyes and we use this product once per day and the bloodshot eyes and dryness is gone. Great product and we will reorder!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman's

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: Any eye drops are expensive these days, but these drops are a good value for the money. I use these and one other brand of eye drops. The other brand moisturizes better, but they come in individual containers. I prefer a bottle of eye drops, perhaps because I'm in my 60's and it just seems easier to have 1 bottle than 50 individual containers. I would recommend this brand. Amazon's price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D in TN

customer_reviews.title: Dry Eye
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor recommended these drops to me. I have to say, the product is very soothing. I like it so much, I take the supplements from the same brand. I have to say it has made a difference in my dry eye. Last year she was talking about plugs if my eyes didn't get any better, this year she didn't even mention it Yea!!. She gave me a coupon for them last year and I have stuck with them ever since. The product is good for dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Menia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for after Lasik-smile surgery!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a year + This is a great product. I can use it as much as I want without my eyes getting irritated it's very soothing amd last for quite a while. I used it after i got the ReLex SMILE surgery (first I used the individually packed sterile drops as recommended) it will work for any dry eyes!
customer_reviews.author: HETbody

customer_reviews.title: finally got relief withttheraTears
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my dry eyes. It has a lubricant in it so it is much more soothing on the eyes than other products. I don't need to use it as often during the day as other products. There Tears has made a big difference in the moisture and comfort in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Hurt and burned my eyes
customer_reviews.text: Please be advise product causes severe burning and when I use them made my eyes hurt had to go to urgent care not sure if the product is faulty or I just got a bad batch when I try to return the item I wasn’t able to get a refund as this item is in eligible for returns. So I wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Torres

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These eye drops are amazing! It's like giving your eyes a refreshing drink. I think the electrolytes really make a difference! I love them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rader

customer_reviews.title: I can't find anything even remotely close for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years. I can't find anything even remotely close for the price. I had Lasik surgery many years ago and my eyes have been very much on the dry side since. Using these in the morning to start the day then as often as needed throughout the day works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: TEK

customer_reviews.title: Only drops that work I have dry eye so bad especially at night I can't even open my eyes ...
customer_reviews.text: Only drops that work I have dry eye so bad especially at night I can't even open my eyes or move them it hurts so bad. I can wake up put a couple small drops and all good no burning like other drops. Very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: grim789

customer_reviews.title: Have been great for dry eyes following Lasik recovery
customer_reviews.text: I recently had Lasik of which a recover symptom is dry eyes. After trying a couple of different brands of eye drops, these are by far the best. They keep my eyes lubricated for hours and I rarely feel like I have dry eyes (which I couldn't say while using a previous brand). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mom of two

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works for me
customer_reviews.text: This stuff just seems to have more of the "lubricant" material than my old tears liquid. If only The Big A could ship it to me without smashing the little box it comes in, it would be really good.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye829

customer_reviews.title: Almost immediately solved days of eye irritation
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it arrived the same day I ordered it! Second, as soon as I made the drops fall into my dry, itchy, red, and burning eyes; I felt an instant relief. The relief lasted over 8 hours, and my dry itchy eyes (allergies) are a thing of the past 2 days later! Would definitely recommend this product, heck I would even use it to treat "Allergy Eyes" on my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Nobody cares

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have much effect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this since it has decent reviews and also the packaging looks nice. Whenever I apply this, it seems like there's really no difference between this and just using water. The moisture doesn't really last and after about 10 minutes your eyes will feel dry again. The two eye drops ive tried in the past that are in similar price range seemed to be way more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Relief at last!
customer_reviews.text: I use these up to five times a day. I have dry eyes from diabetes. it is exactly what my doctor recommended and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Geema Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very good drops
customer_reviews.text: I normally use restasis which works very well for me but I do not like the copays for it so I started trying this. These are very good drops. They feel silky smooth on my fingers and they do not burn or irritate my eyes like some drop do with their preservatives. I don't see a need to try any other drops so will keep ordering these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: RN recommends this for dry eye!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! A few years ago, the main ingredient was only available as a insert you put under your lid. It also required a script. It worked, but it also could scratch your cornea during eye movement, as it did mine. As a RN, I suggested that a totally liquid form would be safer, and just as effective. Someone listened! As a glaucoma and dry eye patient, I needed this. Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Raleighwood

customer_reviews.title: Works great for lasik dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I had lasik a few months ago and my doctor recommended these for my dry eyes. Works very well at keeping my eyes moist and comfortable. I have tried a few other brands, but these work best for me. Price seems high but after some search, looks like Amazon has the lowest price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to harness Bacteria?
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I’ve gotten a bad case I’d eye bacteria. I’m curious to know If somehow bacteria gets in the dropper even though the cap is always on. I never touch my eyes with the tip of the applicator but this seems to happen only when I use these drops consistently. I’ve stopped using them.
customer_reviews.author: natureboy9

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 82 years old, and for two years I suffered with severely burning, watery eyes for four to six hours a day. I tried all the over-the-counter and prescription eye drops, but none helped for more than a few seconds. Then I happened upon Thera Tears Therapy capsules, and after taking three per day for only one month I can truly say that I am cured! The condition started gradually getting better after one week, to the point that now I have no burning at all. It's a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Clark

customer_reviews.title: Rids eyes of redness and hydrates
customer_reviews.text: I wear contact lenses daily and copious amounts of eye makeup, which is always a great way to end up with dry, red, tired eyes. These eye drops definitely don't sting like the Rohto brand eye drops (), they're very mild and feel very hydrating. But they rid me of my redness just as well without all the stinging. The only small con I've found is that the bottle leaks a bit if it isn't placed upright.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmila

customer_reviews.title: Dryer than before
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry but they made my eyes feel worse than anything. It could be just me as I’m highly allergic person many things. I could be I’m allergic something in there’s.
customer_reviews.author: vicki mccabe

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my chronic dry eyes. I have to use it twice a day, but that's much better than some of the others I have used in the past that only last for a couple hours. Overall I like this product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was using prescription. Burned eyes. Expensive. Saw short article in AARP saying don’t use prescription eye drops but not sure why and not seen any other mention. Eyes feel better and lubricated longer.
customer_reviews.author: kjj

customer_reviews.title: Tried several drops and these work the best so far
customer_reviews.text: Tried several drops and these work the best so far. I use these 5 minutes before putting in Latanaprost and they help prevent the irritation. If my eyes seem irritated 15 minutes after the Latanaprost, then I reapply the Thera Tears which helps soothe the eyes. Also, reviewing the ingredients list at Skin Deep, these drops are one of the safest. The only potential issue that I saw was Borates (boric acid). Many eye drops have borates, and some people are sensitive to borates, so your use may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Edvard2001

customer_reviews.title: Good Sized Bottle
customer_reviews.text: It is a good sized bottle and drops come out easily but I have found that these eye drops do not help my dry eyes at all. I just had cataract surgery and the doctor told me to get drops for my dry eyes, the samples that he gave me ran out and the price to buy them were very expensive so I thought I would try these and I am disappointed because now I will have to buy the expensive drops
customer_reviews.author: Puppydog68

customer_reviews.title: Great products, sometimes come in little packages.
customer_reviews.text: I got this sometime around October the 17th and I’ve been wearing colored contact lenses on and off since then. I’ve also used this product even when I’m not wearing lenses, as I’m now able to tell when my eyes feel dry. It’s very helpful for before and after wearing contact lenses. It helps my eyes stay moisturized. 10/10 would recommend and will buy again when I run out. However, for a small bottle, I feel like it has a lot of solution inside of it. So, it’ll probably last me a few more months before I need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: My eyes feel great
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from dry scratchy tearing eyes. I’ve used a different product that has a good reputation but I was still in agony. I read the reviews for Thera tears tried it. It’s FANTASTIC. I’m so grateful. I feel great. No longer have burning eyes can work without discomfort. Try it. I will never be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: ... a year and a half ago and still have terribly dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I had laser surgery done a year and a half ago and still have terribly dry eyes. (Like, wake up in the middle of the night and it feels like I'm ripping my eyes open.) I've tried a bunch of different brands and these are by fair the best. My eyes are really sensitive and some other brands sting or just don't feel like they get all of my eye. These are by far the best. I even think the regular Thera Tears drops are better/more lubricating than their gel version.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are soo dry and are so sensitive. I love this stuff. My eyes get so dry looking at a screen all day or even reading textbooks when studying for exams. I would take this to the library and keep it on me at all times and next to my bed because I love these eye drops. I never really liked eye drops before trying these. I had tried other brands, but these are my favorite and my eyes love them
customer_reviews.author: Katie Doran

customer_reviews.title: Complete relief
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered on time as usual, I opened my Thera Tears and instantly complete relief from 3 days of Tight, Dry Eyes and all of the pain it was causing my sinuses. I did research for which eye drops were right for my severe summer eye problems and I think I found it. A large bottle for a good price, I was prepared to pay twice as much when I chose these
customer_reviews.author: MARK P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: This really helps with my dry eyes. I thought it felt a bit oily at first but it works great without the sting you get from some other simular product.

customer_reviews.title: the seal was broken on the dropper lid
customer_reviews.text: The seal that connects the body of the eye drops to the lid was broken, as if it had already been used/opened. $12 down the drain, thanks a lot, I love wasting money I things I can't use and actually need.

customer_reviews.title: TerribleTears
customer_reviews.text: These eye drops are not good what so ever, I bought these for dry eye symptoms because I kept getting corneal abrasions in my right eye from overnight sleep, so I went to my specialist and he gave me much better eye drops to put in when I go to sleep and they are very helpful unlike these horrible eye drops.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! It makes my eyes comfortable in the morning! No eye trouble!

customer_reviews.title: I’ll keep a ready supply Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what the Doctor suggested, MUCH cheaper and affordable THAN TEARS Naturale! I’ll keep a ready supply Highly Recommend!!!!!!! !m
customer_reviews.author: Marion Adler Young

customer_reviews.title: This product didn't work for me. It burned.
customer_reviews.text: These eyedrops were not soothing. They burned my eyes, and I had to wash them out with my Refresh drops. I could not return them. So I am out the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Karoline A Chiavetta

customer_reviews.title: Good value at 10.88
customer_reviews.text: Package was clean and sealed. Product size provides value. Helps to replace natural tears to keep eyes refreshed. Works if used as directed. Noted the price increase of almost one dollar since my purchase a week ago. Lack of price consistency is a problem with online stores like Amazon, but usually, if shoppers search they can find a better bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Scotspiration™

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing Eye drop, not preservative free
customer_reviews.text: These are more viscous than the generic drops. There are some better drops on the market. I couldn't remember how well these worked but I am not drowning my eyes with drops. I have severe dry eyes and am using four times a day. I put them in the refrigerator and they more soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: Great eye drops
customer_reviews.text: I recently had Lasik eye surgery a few months ago. In preparation for the surgery, you need to start using eye drops a week before the surgery. After the surgery, you need to use eye drops, for at least a week after the surgery. This brand is what the doctors recommended, so I started using them. They have worked great for me so far, without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: RPLTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: Best drops I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: Best drops I've used so far. Usually I need multiple drops to alleviate the dry eyes and it stings. But not this. For the first time, it takes one drop in each eye, and it lasts. Plus no blurring or stinging.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful in winter
customer_reviews.text: In winter my eyes are always rather dry when I wake up in the morning, all the more so since I had lasik surgery. TheraTears are by my side of the bed for first-thing-in-the-morning use. They're also next to my computer because the computer monitor actually dries out the air around it (and thus the eyes looking at it!)
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Eskes

customer_reviews.title: The drops really helped my very dry eyes and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The drops really helped my very dry eyes and the relief lasted a couple of days without reapplying the drops again.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I work night shift some weeks and I believe I suffer from dry eyes. My eyes seem to always look blood shocked. These makes they feel and look so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Pettola

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dry eye drops
customer_reviews.text: DH says this is the best one out there - doesn't need restasis with these. Uses less than any other drop out there as well. Worth the cost. Does not want to use any other type.

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective eye drops
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to eye drops. I get cloudy eyes every day all day,and these drops are comfortable,and clear the clouds the best. They don’t leave annoying dried up eye drops all over my eye lashes like some drops do.

customer_reviews.text: Most eye drops in bottles irritate my eyes because I am allergic to preservatives. This one has preservatives, but for some reason this one doesn't bother me. Don't know why. It's cheaper than buying the one-use vials.

customer_reviews.title: I like them because they seem to soak right in and ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in the desert and eye doctor highly recommends these drops for dry eyes. I have been using for at least 6 months. I like them because they seem to soak right in and are not oily at all. Good drops
customer_reviews.author: Kathy 12345

customer_reviews.title: The only eye drops I buy now
customer_reviews.text: After trying some other eye drop brands with no success, I gave these a try and there is certainly quite a difference! I feel relief from my dry, itchy eyes right away.

customer_reviews.title: Best one for dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: The premium product for chronically dry eyes. Much better than any of the fake tears out there.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Best lubricant eyedrops!!
customer_reviews.text: I have found as I get older my contact lens seems to get drier quicker. I tried this for my drying contact lenses and it works great by extending my contact lens wear time all the way to the evening. I had my wife try it too and she couldn't believe how much longer she can wear her contact lenses. She was more thrilled than I was.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Y

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eye from medication. These drops, when I use them in the morning, last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Christi J Parrent

customer_reviews.title: It's the best eye lubricant among the ones I've tried
customer_reviews.text: It's the best eye lubricant among the ones I've tried ... It feels VERY NATURAL (I hate the sticky feeling some lubricants leave) and more refreshing that purified water. It DOESN'T STING even when my eyes are super dried after those multi-day, overnight computer hours... And ... the main point ... IT DOES LUBRICATE MY EYES !!! I even used it as a rinse when my eyes are at the worst, or to rinse off eye irritants like dust or cosmetic residues from eye make-up/cleaning. It brings immediate and LASTING relief which it's the main reason it's becoming a staple item in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Aquasol

customer_reviews.title: Dry eyes no more!
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor said don’t use any “get the red out” products because they can damage the eye. Felt these eyes drops were expensive, but after using them I feel they’re totally worth the price. My daily screen time is high and my eyes start burning and get very dry. One drop in each eye and I can work for hours without any problems. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cami Rae Walter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great product and great price too. Been using it for several years!

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best of the best
customer_reviews.text: These eyedrops are the best of the best I just had double Cataracts surgery my doctor recommends this product the eye doctor and it feels really good and moisturizers pretty darn well the air in my house where I live is very dry that’s why I use it the air blowing around dries my eyes out
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: Oops! Wrote the review for these drops on the vitamins! These are better than the eye drops the doctor recommended. I use the vitamins as well and they work well together. I haven't had near as many issues with my super dry eyes as I was having before starting these. They are good!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Phelps

product_meta.title: TheraTears Eye Drops for Dry Eyes, Dry Eye Therapy Lubricant Eyedrops, Provides Long Lasting Relief, 30 mL, 1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Value Size
product_meta.description: Size:1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)TheraTears Dry Eye Therapy- Lubricant Eye Drops provide immediate, long lasting relief of dry eye symptoms. Directions - to open, twist tab completely off. Instill 1 or 2 drops in the affected eye(s) as needed.
feature_bullets: DRY EYE RELIEF: Use ThereTears Dry Eye Therapy Lubricant Eye Drops for immediate long lasting relief of dry eye symptoms
RESTORE EYES NATURAL BALANCE: TheraTears electrolyte formula corrects the salt imbalance that can cause dry eye symptoms
UNIQUE SOLUTION: Utilizes a one of a kind hypotonic and electrolyte balanced formula that replicates healthy tears

PRESERVATIVE FREE IN THE EYE: TheraTears offers the benefits of a preservative free solution in a bottle thanks to our unique preserving ingredient that turns into pure oxygen and water on eye contact
DOCTOR CREATED: TheraTears is not only recommmended by doctors, it was created by an Ophthalmologist after 18 years of research

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
